main event: A long silver needle-nosed object was observed by a civilian for 15 minutes on December 1, 1959.
interesting points: The object was observed on a southerly course at 3,000 ft,The sighting lasted for 15 minutes,The object had a shape resembling a needle and was described as silver in color,The civilian observer was a 5th-grade student who observed it from a schoolroom window,The report concludes the object was likely a military aircraft involved in Cold War strategic planning.
witness description: 5th grade student, apparently intelligent and reliable
